Critical.Description:
Não compila: # github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/cmd/depguard-lite
E:\go1.25.0\go\pkg\tool\windows_amd64\link.exe: resize output file failed: truncate $WORK\b382\exe\a.out.exe: There is not enough space on the disk.
#...
Critical.Suggestion: Corrija os erros de compilação listados

Fixability.ManualSteps: Corrija os erros de compilação manualmente, um por um

Examples: E:\go1.25.0\go\pkg\tool\windows_amd64\link.exe: resize output file failed: truncate $WORK\b382\exe\a.out.exe: There is not enough space on the disk.
E:\go1.25.0\go\pkg\tool\windows_amd64\link.exe: resize output file failed: truncate $WORK\b001\exe\a.out.exe: There is not enough space on the disk.

Fixability.ManualSteps:
1. Analise cada issue do linter
2. Corrija manualmente, entendendo o contexto
3. NÃO use golangci-lint run --fix (pode quebrar código)
4. Execute testes após cada correção

Examples: level=error msg="[linters_context] typechecking error: : # github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/internal/handlers [github.com/vertikon/mcp-ultra/internal/handlers.test]\ninternal\\handlers\\health_test.go:9:7: initialization cycle: contentTypeJSON refers to itself"
internal\metrics\storage.go:186:47: unused-parameter: parameter 'groupKey' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
internal\metrics\business.go:900:39: unused-parameter: parameter 'config' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
func NewMetricStorage(backend string, config map[string]interface{}) (MetricStorage, error) {
internal\handlers\http\health_test.go:184:55: unused-parameter: parameter 'ctx' seems to be unused, consider removing or renaming it as _ (revive)
